Function reference

Loading Genome Data

Functions for loading and visualizing genomic data

AlignSeqs()
Align a Set of Unaligned Sequences
AlignTranslation()
Align Sequences By Their Amino Acid Translation
BrowseSeqs()
View Sequences in a Web Browser
BrowseDB()
View a Database Table in a Web Browser
SearchDB()
Obtain Specific Sequences from a Database
Seqs2DB()
Add Sequences from Text File to Database
DB2Seqs()
Export Database Sequences to a FASTA or FASTQ File

Gene Calling and Annotation

Functions for calling and annotating genetic regions

FindGenes()
Find Genes in a Genome
FindNonCoding()
Find Non-Coding RNAs in a Genome
LearnNonCoding()
Learn a Non-Coding RNA Model
IdTaxa()
Assign Sequences a Taxonomic Classification
plot(<Taxa>) print(<Taxa>) `[`(<Taxa>)
Taxa training and testing objects
LearnTaxa()
Train a Classifier for Assigning Taxonomy

Constructing COGs

Functions to construct COGs from annotated genetic regions

DisjointSet()
Return single linkage clusters from PairSummaries objects.
ExtractBy()
Extract and organize DNAStringSetss.
FindSets()
Find all single linkage clusters in an undirected pairs list.
print(<LinkedPairs>)
Tables of where syntenic hits link pairs of genes
NucleotideOverlap()
Tabulating Pairs of Genomic Sequences
PairSummaries()
Summarize connected pairs in a LinkedPairs object
BlockExpansion()
Attempt to expand blocks of paired features in a PairSummaries object.

Constructing Phylogenies

Functions for phylogenetic reconstruction of genomes or COGs

Cophenetic()
Compute cophenetic distances on dendrogram objects
DistanceMatrix()
Calculate the Distances Between Sequences
IdClusters()
Cluster Sequences By Similarity
TreeLine()
Construct a Phylogenetic Tree
WriteDendrogram()
Write a Dendrogram to Newick Format

Finding Co-evolving Gene Collectives

Functions for finding co-evolutionary signal between COGs

ProtWeaver()
ProtWeaver: Predicting Protein Functional Association Networks
predict(<ProtWeaver>)
Make predictions with ProtWeaver objects
plot(<ProtWeb>)
Plot predictions in a ProtWeb object
GetProtWebData(<ProtWeb>)
Extract information from a ProtWeb object
